title: AO Principles of Fracture Management
role_in_edaitutor: Authoritative reference on fracture biology, fixation principles, and surgical indications.

chapters.summary: Covers the biology of fracture healing and the mechanical environment required for optimal recovery.
Summarises key principles of anatomic reduction, fixation stability, and implant choice.
Provides systematic guidance for upper limb fracture classification and management.
Discusses classification and stabilisation options for lower limb fractures.
